hello:
>>> :wave: Hey! I am **{{.botName}}**. Im capable of recording everything you say and transform it into an audio message.
:flag_gb: I am configured to talk to you in english.
:microphone2: To start recording, enter the channel **{{.voiceChannel}}** and start talking to me.
:sound: When you get out the channel, I will send the audio message.
stats:
>>> :chart_with_upwards_trend: **Monthly stats**: 

:earth_africa: Global stats:
- {{.globalDuration}} seconds of audio sent
- {{.globalAmount}} audio files recorded
- Median duration of {{.globalMedianDuration}} seconds
stats-empty: >>> :tired_face: Start sending voice messages to have stats!
achievement_longest_audio_description: He managed to talk for **{{.seconds}} seconds ** straight. Respect!
achievement_most_audios_sent_description: He sent **{{.audios}} audios**, please, give me a break!
